AuthServer.description: URL for the Okta server, note no preceding https: is required.

PeriodicUpdateTime.description: Time in minutes between periodic background updates.

SignInCommand.description: Path to a script or other binary to be run after a successful sign in.

UseKeychainPrompt.description: Shows the Sign In window on launch unless the user has a password in the keychain.

UseKeychainPromptExlusions.description: List of users that can ignore the keychain prompt.

SignInLogo.description: Path to a logo file. The space is 342x90 pixels.

TitleSignIn.description: Title of the Sign In window.

LabelUsername.description: The text label for the username field in the Sign In window.

LabelPassword.description: The text label for the password field in the Sign In window.

DontShowWelcome.description: Disables the showing of the welcome splash screen on launch.

AutoAuth.description: Determines if web extensions automatically authenticate via the NoMAD Pro UI.

CheckSafariExtension.description: Determines if the user is warned that the NoMAD Pro extension has not been enabled in Safari.

MessagePluginDisabled.default: Please enable the plugin in Safari.
MessagePluginDisabled.description: Text to show when alerting the user that the Safari plugin has not been enabled.

IgnoreDomainReachability.description: Determines if SRV record lookups are used to determine if the AD domain is reachable.

LDAPServers.description: Specific Domain Controllers to use for AD lookups.

KerberosRealm.description: Kerberos realm to use to get Kerberos tickets as a side effect of authentication.

TicketsOnSignIn.description: Causes NoMAD Pro to get Kerberos Tickets.

KerberosRenew.description: Determines if the Kerberos tickets should be renewed or not.

KerberosShortNameAsk.description: Determines if the user is asked to enter their Kerberos short name on first sign in.

KerberosShortNameAskMessage.default: Please enter your AD user name.
KerberosShortNameAskMessage.description: The message text when asking the user for their Kerberos short name.

KerberosShortName.description: The shortname to use for Kerberos tickets. If unset the sign in name is used.

UseKeychain.description: Determines if the Okta password is stored in the user's keychain.

LocalPasswordSync.description: Determines if the Okta password is synchronized with the local account.

LocalPasswordSyncOnMatchOnly.description: Only sync the password if the Okta account name is the same as the local account name.

LocalPasswordSyncMessage.default: Please enter your local user account password.
LocalPasswordSyncMessage.description: The alert dialog text that the user is presented with when asked to enter in his or her local password.

KeychainItems.title: KeychainItems
KeychainItems.description: Items to update when the user's local password is updated as well.

KeychainItemsDebug.description: Updates keychain items on every sign in. Used for debugging.

ChangePasswordOrder.description: Determines the order and setting for the password change menu. NOT IMPLEMENTED YET, THERE IS NO DOCUMENTATION ON THIS KEY.

PasswordChangeCommand.description: Script or other binary to run when a password is successfully changed.

ChangePasswordTimer.description: Time in minutes until the user is prompted to sign in again after a Password Change.

WarnOnPasswordExpiration.description: Determines whether NoMAD Pro should warn the user on sign in if the password is about to expire.

PasswordExpirationMenu.description: Determines if the countdown before password expiration is shown in the menu.

PasswordExpirationMenuDays.description: Number of days remaining before the password expiration countdown is shown in the menu bar.

ExpirationWarningDays.description: Number of days remaining before sending notifications via the Notification Center.

ADExpirationShow.description: Shows a menu item beneath the current user's name showing the user's password expiration as determined by AD.

PasswordPolicy.description: Complexity policy for changing the password via Kerberos.

ExportableKey.description: Allows the private key of the user certificate to be exported.

X509CA.description: FQDN of the Windows web CA for NoMAD Pro to use for certificates.

Template.description: Certificate template to request when using the Windows CA.

WifiNetworks.description: A list of wireless networks that the certificate created by NoMAD Pro should be associated with.

MenuIcon.description: Path to a 16x16 pixel image to use as the icon in the menu bar.

ActionsUpdateTime.description: Number of minutes between updating the Actions Menu.

GetHelpOptions.description: URL or Path for GetHelpType (<<serial>>, <<fullname>>, <<shortname>> and <<domain>> are currently supported as substitutions)

SelfServicePath.description: File path for a Self Service application not found automatically.

HideChangePassword.description: Hides the Change Password menu item.

HideGetHelp.description: Hides the Get Help menu item.

HideGetSoftware.description: Hides the Get Software menu item.

HideLockScreen.description: Hides the Lock Screen menu item.

HideSignIn.description: Hides the Sign In menu item.

MessagePasswordChangePolicy.description: Message text when changing password via Kerberos for the AD complexity policy.

MenuAbout.description: Menu item text for the About item.

MenuActions.description: Menu item text for the Actions item.

MenuChangePassword.description: Menu item text for the Change Password item.

MenuGetHelp.description: Menu item text for the Get Help item.

MenuGetSoftware.description: Menu item text for the Get Software item.

MenuLockScreen.description: Menu item text for the Lock Screen item.

MenuPreferences.description: Menu item text for the Preferences item.

MenuSignIn.description: Menu item text for the Sign In item.
